front.title: Evaluating Multi-homing Support in NEMO Basic Solution

abstract.t: This draft describes and explains prerequisites for NEMO Basic to support Multi-homing. We study those prerequisites with respect to each case of a taxonomy proposed to the NEMO WG and we analyze how the NEMO basic support solution fits with them. The analysis of each case listed in this taxonomy is broken into three parts, prerequisites, comments, and solution behaviors.
